title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell
description: Exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table that is located inside a grid cell.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: No exception should be thrown when exporting data from a table inside a grid cell.
SR:
1. Insert a grid into the application.
2. Place a table inside one of the grid cells.
3. Attempt to export data from the table.
